div.p: This Maven plugin generates the Netbeans Module (NBM) files.
Currently the plugin ensures that your artifacts become Netbeans modules, creates nbm files for easy updating, not only for your project but possibly also for it's dependencies.
Currently the 0.1 version is available for download.
To get latest snapshot of 0.2, please checkout the project from cvs.
To install the plugin, go to the Sourceforge download page and get the zipped/tarred plugin. Then extract it to your MAVEN_HOME/plugins directory.
